Class BalanceMenuView

java.lang.Object
BalanceMenuView
public class BalanceMenuView extends Object
The BalanceMenuView class represents the view or user interface for displaying the balance menu in a vending machine. It provides methods to show the current balance of the vending machine to the user. This class is responsible for presenting balance information in a user-friendly format. It communicates with the BalanceMenuController to retrieve balance data and update the display.
